iris-grib
=========

|CirrusCI|_ |Coveralls|_ |conda-forge|_ |pypi|_ |License|_ |Commits|_ |Contributors|_

GRIB interface for `Iris <https://github.com/SciTools/iris>`_.

iris-grib is licensed under the BSD-3 license.
